snippet: The hope that polio would be eradicated was dimmed this year when three countries allowed the virus to be carried beyond their borders.
abstract: Editorial laments news from World Health Organization that polio virus, once headed toward eradication, has spread to new countries in 2014; asserts that vigorous vaccination efforts backed by public and private donors are clearly required in any nation with polio cases.
lead_paragraph: The hope that polio would be eradicated was dimmed this year when three countries allowed the virus to be carried beyond their borders.

headline.main: The Global Polio Threat, Back Again
headline.print_headline: The Global Polio Threat, Back Again
